getClassesPath

public static java.lang.String getClassesPath()
Gets the absolute path of the "classes" folder, if and only if the root path is not null, otherwise it returns null.

Returns:
the absolute path of the "classes" folder, or null

getLibPath

public static java.lang.String getLibPath()
Gets the absolute path of the "lib" folder, if and only if the root path is not null, otherwise it returns null.

Returns:
the absolute path of the "lib" folder, or null

getSrcPath

public static java.lang.String getSrcPath()
Gets the absolute path of the "src" folder, if and only if the root path is not null, otherwise it returns null. The first time this method is invoked, the src folder is created.

Returns:
the absolute path of the "src" folder

getJavacPath

public static java.lang.String getJavacPath()
Gets the absolute path of the "javac" folder, if and only if the root path is not null, otherwise it returns null. The first time this method is invoked, the javac folder is created.

Returns:
the absolute path of the "javac" folder
